resources.string: Press on color below to apply
Allowing applications to request root access is very dangerous and could compromise the security of your system!
Disabling the camera shutter sound is illegal in some areas! Please check the applicable law in your country
When screen off, long-pressing the volume rockers will seek music tracks
Prevent loud volume levels when headset is first plugged in
Listening at high volume for long periods may damage your hearing. Disable it with caution.
Limit the notification sounds of each app to only play once per set time period
Volume keys control media volume rather than notifications
Pressing the volume rocker up/down will wake the device
Wake up device if charger is plugged/unplugged.
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
When Privacy Guard is enabled, %s will not be able to access personal data such as contacts, messages, location or call logs.
When enabling Privacy Guard for the built-in app %s, the app will not be able to access personal data such as contacts, messages, location or call logs. This may cause other apps to misbehave.
Do not access personal data by default for newly-installed apps
Show notification if privacy guard is active.
Manage which apps have access to your personal data and other apps permissions
No apps with relevant permissions are installed

In this screen you can choose for which apps Privacy Guard should be active by simply tapping on them. Selected apps will not be able to access your personal data, such as contacts, messages, location or call logs. Long pressing on an entry allows to set specifically app permissions.\n\nBy default built-in apps are not shown. If you want to show them or filter apps to show only the ones requesting access to personal data by their permissions, select the respective options in the menu.
Selected app does not request permissions which access personal data. Do you want to modify the other permissions?
Reset all permissions back to default?
This app has no changeable permissions.
Include options in the power menu for rebooting into recovery and bootloader
Display a notification when USB debugging is connected
Kill the foreground app by long-pressing the back button
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Notification text animation in the statusbar
Adjust brightness by sliding across status bar
Reset all dimensions entries to default?
Navigation bar height while in portrait
Navigation bar height while in landscape.
Navigation bar height if the bar is along a side
Select and preview system toast animation
Change hosts file to disable ads
Updating hosts file failed. Please try again.
Double tap status bar or lock screen slider to put the device to sleep
Show notifications from this app on the lockscreen
Never show ongoing notifications from this app on the lockscreen
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Open Quick Settings when there are %1$s notifications present
Disable quick settings on secure lockscreen.
Check the proximity sensor prior to waking up screen
Plays sound effect when screenshot is taken
Enable or disable the Google search bar in the recents menu
An error occurred.\n\nPlease check for root access. To activate go into superuser settings and enable root access.
Changing your default LCD density can sometimes cause certain apps to not function properly and/or the playstore to show apps being incompatible with your device
Tablets generally use 160 dpi while high end devices use 320 or 480 dpi. Older devices use 240 dpi
You need to reboot your device for your change to take effect
Changing your default LCD density can sometimes cause certain apps to not function properly and/or the playstore to show apps being incompatible with your device"
Zipalign any unaligned apps on each boot
Fix permissions on apps and their data on each boot
Clear application cache files each boot
Speed up file systems at boot
It looks like init.d isn\'t setup properly. Please contact your ROM developer.
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
Change the order of PIN pad numbers
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
View or change custom lock screen shortcuts
Open custom lock screen shortcuts on longpress
Show notifications from this app as heads up
If snooze button is pressed, disable heads up for %d minutes
Heads up notification will show up for %d seconds
Heads up notification will show until it is dismissed
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
Reset network traffic color to default?
Could not load %s. Make sure you have storage available.
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
Double tap anywhere on the navigation bar to force sleep
Show in battery statistics unaccounted and over-counted usage.
Must draw gesture to unlock screen
How to draw an unlock gesture
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Time that the screen stays on for notification pulse
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Display the number of pending notifications
Show circle app launcher after touching right side of screen
Apps will show in app circle bar
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area

This will hide all Immersive Mode Messages
